    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="68627" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="68627" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.90</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="1933">1,933</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="283"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Hero</b> by <b>Burberry</b> is a Woody Spicy fragrance for men. <b>Hero</b> was launched in 2021. The nose behind this fragrance is Aurélien Guichard. Top note is Bergamot; middle notes are Juniper and Black Pepper; base notes are Atlas Cedar, Virginian Cedar and Himalayan Cedar. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Burberry/Hero-68627.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2336234" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mustafaaaa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2308493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2308493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mustafaaaa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2336234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2336234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2308493">Mustafaaaa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 21:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely love this!!!<br />
An amazing fresh, woody, and slightly citrusy fragrance. Extremely versatile fragrance suitable for all occasions. I tend to wear it spring through fall, but not often in winter. I find it isn’t strong enough, and doesn’t project well in temperatures below 10 degrees centigrade. A great daily and safe purchase.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2336234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2336234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2324736" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2324736" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="thexel8"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2293837"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="thexel8" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2324736ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2324736" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2293837">thexel8</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-23">10/23/24 05:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nice, but nothing special. Smells like any other men's generic luxury fragrance. Overall lackluster performance. Safe blind buy.<br />
<br />
4.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2324736"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2324736#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2322271" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2322271" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HappyMonster42"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148022"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2148022.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HappyMonster42" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2322271ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2322271" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2148022">HappyMonster42</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-20">10/20/24 19:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I do not like this</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2322271"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2322271#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2322158" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2322158" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lil.rascal"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1983348"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lil.rascal" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2322158ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2322158" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1983348">lil.rascal</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-20">10/20/24 15:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Burberry Hero EDP smells amazing. It gives off a fresh out-of-the-shower vibe and keeps me smelling fresh all day. The scent balances warmth and freshness perfectly. It's ideal for fall and winter, with its cozy, clean, and warm aroma that fits perfectly with the cooler months.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2322158"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2322158#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312613" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312613" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="brwarren83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1217539"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1217539.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="brwarren83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/L-Homme-734.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.734.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Homme"title="L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312613ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312613" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1217539">brwarren83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 15:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find it interesting that 2 of my most favorite designer scents (this and D&amp;G K EDT) are also 2 of the most hated amongst the fragrance community lol. I love this stuff. Bright with a hint of spice. People say it’s generic but it’s quite unique to my nose. I went back and forth between if I liked this or the EDP more, but I think the EDT is my fav. If I had to strip my 40+ bottle collection (niche, designer, and clones/cheapies) to 10, Burberry Hero EDT would make the cut. Plus my wife likes it on me as well. It’s longevity is it’s only drawback in my opinion. Projects really good for me for maybe an hour and then suddenly turns into a skin scent. I have a dupe roller ball oil that I sometimes wear with it to help. But yeah, this is one I’ve been kinda obsessed with since I first smelled it in the mall 2 years before I actually bought it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2312613"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2312613#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308778" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2305966" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Turbo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067509"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1067509.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Turbo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/K-by-Dolce-Gabbana-Eau-de-Parfum-62311.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62311.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="K by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum"title="K by Dolce & Gabbana Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2305966ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2305966" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067509">Turbo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-05">10/05/24 13:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is a little woodsy, but sweet, manly, but not too musky. Not too unique, candleish, but well blanced, which I think is always key to any cologne. Definetly long lasting and pleasent to keep smelling. Not one of my absolute favorite scents, but I think this is certainly a winner and will be popular for a long time.<br />
<br />
Edit: The more I smell this, the more generic it gets. It reminds me of the Armani, invictus, saint laurent, zara, legend, jimmy choo, coach, boss, etc odors of the sweeter kind. It's still good, but less unique than I first thought with a sample.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2305966"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2305966#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296881" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Like 30 minutes and then it's a skin scent which only lasts for another two hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2272022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2272022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2269656" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2269656" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anth_ny"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259210"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1259210.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anth_ny" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Etat-Libre-d-Orange/I-am-Trash-Les-Fleurs-du-Dechet-50009.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50009.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="I am Trash - Les Fleurs du Déchet"title="I am Trash - Les Fleurs du Déchet"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2269656ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2269656" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1259210">anth_ny</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-02">09/02/24 22:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I think of office-style fragrances, this is the first thing that comes to mind. It's safe, inoffensive, masculine, yet somewhat subtle. Smells clean and woody. Virtually perfect for the office imo</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2269656"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2269656#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264000" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264000" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragranceAnon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596915"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1596915.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragranceAnon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-by-Night-49144.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49144.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wanted by Night"title="Wanted by Night"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264000ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264000" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1596915">FragranceAnon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 14:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was "meh" to me on intial spray, but, for some reason, I kept wanting to smell it.<br />
<br />
After a few days, I realized that this is really good. It's not a heavy or resinous scent, just a lightweight, sweet cedar with a little spice.  <br />
<br />
Appropriate for just about any occassion or season; it's not sweet to the point of seeming juvenile or dry to the point of smelling overly mature. Longevity and projection are on the lighter side of moderate.<br />
<br />
You can get the 100 mL for under $70 right now on discounters, and I think that's fair.<br />
<br />
In the end, this went from a "meh" to a firm "like."</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2264000"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2264000#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2249412" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2249412" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jonslok"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201543"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jonslok" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2249412ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2249412" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2201543">Jonslok</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-14">08/14/24 15:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly nothing ground breaking. It’s an inoffensive fragrance that works for any season or occasion. You really cannot go wrong with this one. The projection and longevity is shit, but it’s ok since you can overspray. The bottle really speaks volumes for how creative this fragrance is. You’d be better of buying Versace Dylan blue or Ysl y EDP, but if you’re looking for a yellow ish bottle, get this I guess. Also if you’re new to fragrances and need something that works for everything, maybe get this, but I’d still recommend the previously stated fragrances more. Other than that I would not recommend. Kinda alright I guess.<br />
<br />
6.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2249412"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2249412#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2245923" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This has the "cologne" smell familiar with the classic masculine fragrances. I really like it. Suitable for more mature men. I wish they would make an EDP concentration of this. The current EDP is a completely different fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2245923"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2245923#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2239306" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Compliment worthy, clean, really nice take on woods. Not exactly my favorite but not disappointed at all. 7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2239306"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2239306#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2234600" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2234600" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elfin Will"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676994"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1676994.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elfin Will" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/Bronze-Goddess-Nuit-71476.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71476.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bronze Goddess Nuit"title="Bronze Goddess Nuit"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2234600ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2234600" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676994">Elfin Will</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-31">07/31/24 07:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>IN LOVE WITH THIS! The scent is familiar.. maybe reminiscent of Sauvage? Y? Terre d'Hermes? .... But oh my.. that one is soo simple yet so addicting... It's RAW cedar wood for once.. Barely affected by other notes.. It has a sweet woodiness to it.. enhanced by the non-empowering spiciness of black pepper and the green accord of juniper.. and the bergamot is here for a soft citrusy touch, that balances the woodiness.. This is just.. PERFECT... Not a singular synthetic note to my nose... Smells like hiking in a deep green forest... <br />
<br />
9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2234600"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2234600#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217165" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2217165" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="evilherojoseph"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1759369"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="evilherojoseph" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roger-Gallet/Open-5973.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5973.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Open"title="Open"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2217165ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2217165" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1759369">evilherojoseph</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-13">07/13/24 00:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Citrusy spicy opening with a warm wood in the background. Definately more for day and warmer months, as it lacks the sweetness and heaviness of notes like leather to make it appropriate for cool weather. <br />
This gives me the same vibes like Sauvage, that is, a spicy bergamot opening with a warm base ( here it is wood instead of amber ). The wood lingers for the drydown, providing a serene, warm, soothing feeling, smelling like cardboard / recycled book pages with tea, peppered with spicyness, sitting close to the skin.<br />
 A mild, generic, inoffensive and likeable smell, projection moderate, longevity moderate. For the price I would say not worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2217165"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2217165#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2217086" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029838">bolancb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-12">07/12/24 22:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I reviewed this one on here already, but I’ll say it ONCE, TWICE, 3 TIMES, THIS IS A F ING MASTERPIECE PERIOD!!! IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A DUPE DONE AT EXTRAIT DE PARFUM LEVEL CHECKOUT DUA FRAGRANCE AND THANK ME LATER ✌🏼❤️</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2217086"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2217086#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2192815" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2192815" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Moyashi04"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974296"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1974296.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Moyashi04" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2192815ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2192815" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1974296">Moyashi04</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-19">06/19/24 04:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I could really see Adam Driver using this. It is masculine to say the least but it also has some kind of sweetnes to it. While it may not be a groundbreaking smell, it is definitely good. This could go nice inbetween 10-22 C°. Nice with an overcoat and a light jacket.<br />
I like Burberry in general and this was something that I expected to be good and it fulfilled my expectations. It has that overcoat-scarf-hat combination kind of smell (by that, I mean it would suit that trio really good). Because it was not groundbreaking, I was really in the middle of a 7 and an 8 and at the end of the day...<br />
8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2192815"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2192815#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2187784" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2187784" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rolls.oud&amp;cigar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/199212"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.199212.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rolls.oud&amp;cigar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2187784ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2187784" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/199212">rolls.oud&amp;cigar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-14">06/14/24 03:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>People have to understand summer fragrances, some climates are hot and humid and you will be very limited on what you can wear and enjoy, and this definitely won't shine in Switzerland summer, this is needs a Dubai, Bangkok, Indonesia kind of humidity and this will shine, it gives me a cigar humidor vibe not that i am saying it smells like tobacco, this woody with hint of herb, i used to wear the discontinued Dsquard he wood, probably similar scent profile but to my nose Burberry hero EDT is the winner, i have ignored hero because realistically Burberry makes super safe fresh fragrances for the summer, not alot of character in them if that makes sense they are your typical YouTube reviewers safe for likes and views, not this one tho, i don't care about your European beautiful summer breeze wear creed smw or rasasi hawas for that, you live in high humidity climate sample this one, look for 2-3 ml sample give it a try for that humid night out, i have a sample of this, and i do have some nice collection for the humidity this is on my wishlist and will definitely pick up a full bottle</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; Smells completely different than I remember. The bergamot is so fresh and juicy, and I love the strong cedar backbone. This is perfect for all year wear, as with most Burberry fragrances, performance and longevity are slightly above average. I have a feeling I'll be reaching for this one a lot this summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2180974"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2180974#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2164530" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2143210"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2143210#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2135830" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2135830" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aleksandr_Artemev"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1928302.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aleksandr_Artemev" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2135830ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2135830" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1928302">Aleksandr_Artemev</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-25">04/25/24 06:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got this as a sample kit with the 2 flankers as a gift from buying London. Honestly, this is pretty nice. On my skin, it's really weak though. A skin scent within an hour, and doesn't last longer than 3-4 hrs. Also, I'd say it's overpriced, even though it's about 40-60 euros</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2135830"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2135830#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133853" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133853" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Adrian Papaki"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995757"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1995757.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Adrian Papaki" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133853ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133853" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995757">Adrian Papaki</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 10:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've got this as a sample from notino, it reminds me of legend spirit for some reason.<br />
It's a nice freshie but a bit generic to be real, good but doesn't wow me in any way</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2133853"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2133853#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2132629" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2132629" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brett_Sinclair"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091479"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2091479.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brett_Sinclair" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2132629ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2132629" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2091479">Brett_Sinclair</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-22">04/22/24 10:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I honestly think this is a masterpiece. It's a very woody fragrance but with a warm, slightly sweet hint to it. It's masculine but sexy. Youthful but sophisticated. I could wear this all day long, every day. At work, on a date, just lounging round the house... I can't get enough of this smell. <br />
It's perfect for all age ranges too. It's just a great all round classy scent. I've recently bought a few supposedly woody fragrances on my search for a new signature scent. Terre d'Hermes, Dior Homme Sport, MontBlanc Explorer but this is hands down the best of the bunch and as soon as it hit my nostrils, I knew I'd found the one.<br />
Projection and silage is average. It's not beast mode but it's not a poor performer either. It's what I'd expect from this sort of price point and there's nothing stopping you from applying a couple of extras sprays after a few hours if you want to top up the performance. <br />
This gets a perfect 10 from me. It's my new signature scent and is probably the best masculine woody fragrance available today.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2132629"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2132629#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2131503" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; 'Safe'.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2131503"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2131503#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2129771" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Mmm, you smell like coconut!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2123435"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2123435#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2120650" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2120650"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2120650#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2120380" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2120380" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="VanHessen1234"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081240"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="VanHessen1234" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Armaf/Club-de-Nuit-Intense-27656.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27656.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Club de Nuit Intense"title="Club de Nuit Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2120380ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2120380" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2081240">VanHessen1234</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-10">04/10/24 09:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bergamot provides a fresh, citrusy aroma, juniper adds a crisp and slightly woody note, while cedar offers a warm, earthy scent. Sets down nicely on the skin and is not too overpowering or masculine.<br />
<br />
The combination smells refreshing and comforting, and the fact that i find it unisex highlights its versatility and appeal across genders. A well-balanced and elegant fragrance can certainly be appreciated by anyone! I really like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2120380"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2120380#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119387" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2119387" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="latterlyjeremyfragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2055010"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2055010.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="latterlyjeremyfragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Amore-Caffe-87409.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87409.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amore Caffè"title="Amore Caffè"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2119387ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2119387" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2055010">latterlyjeremyfragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-09">04/09/24 11:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>nobody gives burberry hero any recognition, the scent is amazing, its a fresh spicy at first then it develops into a woody cedar scent, its a very pleasant smell that is super underrated, the bergamot note is super nice and smells amazing.<br />
the longevity is about 7-8 hours which is enough to wear to school ( which is mostly what I use it for ), its also fancy enough to use for formal events like business meetings, I preferred to wear it during spring. its projection is kinda mid, it projects well for the first 3 hours but after that it isn't as noticeable. <br />
it costs about 120$ cad for 100ml, not a terrible price but not worth it honestly<br />
7/10<br />
It is worth picking up as a more formal fragrance</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2119387"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2119387#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2118643" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2118643" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Bchexus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2061690"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2061690.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Bchexus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2118643ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2118643" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); It's simple but it is one of my favorites! While overall proformance isn't that good, it is still a beautiful fragrance while also being versitile. It smells very woody with some fresh bergamot and personally reminds me of the smell of a fresh cristmas tree. Fresh, woody and citrusy would be how I describe this fragrance. I still give my vote for Diesel Only The Brave, it seems to be a little bit better performer between two.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2087049"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2087049#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2081817" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2081817" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="schnoorzoky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2033873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="schnoorzoky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Missoni/Missoni-Wave-61329.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.61329.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Missoni Wave"title="Missoni Wave"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2081817ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2081817" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2033873">schnoorzoky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-04">03/04/24 09:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is just a great cedar fragrance. Nothing challenging. Masculine and classy. Love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2081817"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2081817#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2076758" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2076758" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cjwalton27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1726488"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="cjwalton27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Francis-Kurkdjian/724-75754.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75754.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="724"title="724"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2076758ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2076758" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1726488">cjwalton27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-28">02/28/24 08:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is one that you can wear anywhere anytime. You can wear it to school or a business meeting, it doesn't really matter. Lasts a decent amount of time and smells like a woody classy fragrance that's slightly subtle. <br />
Scent: 7.7/10<br />
Projection: 6/10<br />
Longevity: 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2076758"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2076758#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2073304" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If you see a discount, you could grab one. (Mine is 50% off, 50ml).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2073304"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2073304#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2064811" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2064811" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bartca89"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1970256"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1970256.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bartca89" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Fahrenheit-Le-Parfum-23099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fahrenheit Le Parfum"title="Fahrenheit Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2064811ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2064811" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1970256">bartca89</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-17">02/17/24 00:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sure, it may be non-complex and fairly simple... but it's a really nice masculine scent. I agree with the reviewer who said it actually ends up being quite unique in its simple goodness. It certainly is versatile. I really like it. Only issue I have is, the performance is fairly weak, while the price is still high compared to other casual frags like Mont Blanc Legend or what have you. So you can overspray it and smell amazing, but it's a tad pricey for that type of thing. Still... I find myself reaching for it fairly often.<br />
<br />
BTW -- I find using the EDT in the daytime and the EDP in the evening is a great way to go with this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2064811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2064811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2063400" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2063400" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Filolek3037"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571518"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1571518.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Filolek3037" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2063400ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2063400" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571518">Filolek3037</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-15">02/15/24 14:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Bought this for my fiancé because…well…I liked it! It smells amazing on him and I’m sure it does on almost everyone. It’s a fresh, lemony-spicy and tingly opening, then slightly woody, very inviting and „manly“- sweet (just teeny-tiny bit). What’s best is that it doesn’t start to smell „old“ or „worn tor too long“ as I think lots of the gentleman’s perfumes do (like Dior sauvage or gucci guilty etc). In short: Smells like a manly man who just showered and is always in a good mood with a big smile on his face but in a cool, not goofy way</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2057581" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jermey fragrance fan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2006020"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2006020.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jermey fragrance fan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2057581ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2057581" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); For around 50 euros, it's a very nice-smelling fragrance that lasts I'd say, around 5–6 hours. It has a very woody/citrusy smell and smells very fresh. As far as the sillage, it's moderate. I very much recommend this for spring, summer, and fall.<br />
Update: I sprayed some on my wrist yesterday night (around 12am) and I can still lightly smell it at 6:40PM today.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2057581"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2057581#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2053040" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2032802" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PULPUL75"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1932919"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1932919.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PULPUL75" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Amber-Heath-45422.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45422.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amber Heath"title="Amber Heath"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2032802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2032802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);
