C U 😘</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2032802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2032802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2029183" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1160015">K&ouml;biD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-09">01/09/24 08:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As a woman, I love this on a man! Smelling it, I associate a romantic date or a late summer evening stroll hand-in-hand by a lake, cuddling up when the colder air hits after sunset. The combination of the cooler top / middle notes and the warmer base notes reminds me of late summer and early fall days in nature. I also appreciate that there is no unpleasant sharpness, just freshness, which adds a  tad of sophistication.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2025406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2025406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2022052" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; idk if i got a bad bottle but lasts ons kins for about 2h for me</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2018791"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2018791#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2016843" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2016843" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hihero"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898197"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1898197.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hihero" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Reflection-Man-920.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.920.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Reflection Man"title="Reflection Man"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2016843ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2016843" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1898197">hihero</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-01">01/01/24 08:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was my signature scent for the longest time. Wore it for 2 years straight (maybe skipped some days). My partner loved it and when I was around the house I only sprayed twice and never more than 4. So definitely projected within arms length and smells pleasant. It's rather safe and hits it's stride best on a warmer day. I started to associate this scent with moments in my life I needed to be daring, brave or courageous towards the end of my 100ml bottle and the funny thing is so did the people around me because they've smelt this off my skin for so many years. I created this signature identity around this fragrance which makes me consider picking up the EDP for winter. I think what you get here is a money well spent pleasant softly projecting woody fragrance that won't blow you away but has so much versatility and is a joy to wear in the great outdoors.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2016843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2016843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015265" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2015265" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PSL"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950479"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1950479.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PSL" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2015265ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2015265" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1950479">PSL</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-30">12/30/23 10:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Maybe the safest scent you can get. <br />
<br />
My go-to for gym, work, family gatherings etc.<br />
<br />
Don`t expect something crazy, it`s just safe and mid.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2015265"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2015265#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2008901" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's not bad it actually smells wonderful, but it's just kind of boring, like I've smelled similar a hundred times but what I usually smell that is similar is better. Longevity is nothing to impress either I get 4 to 6 hrs. Overall I have to give this a 7 out of 10 as it's just mediocre.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2008646"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2008646#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2008468" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2006938" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dannatello"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1912100"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1912100.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dannatello" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-Eau-de-Parfum-75182.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75182.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hero Eau de Parfum"title="Hero Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2006938ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2006938" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1912100">Dannatello</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-21">12/21/23 06:23</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This and the EDP are unique. Nothing smells like them. They stand out on any walk through smelling of a departments scents. It's not blue and it's not ambroxan and it's not sweet. This bucks the trend. It doesn't smell like any older or classic scent so it really has potential to create new and unique impressions on people. This stands out. If you smell several scents in a day and also smell this, you will understand. Closely harmonized accords of a gentlemanly and sexy wood, not smoke nor tobacco.  Not fresh citrus or sailing scent. This is a sophisticated lumberjacks go to, the homesteading bitcoin investor who home schools his kids and knows self sufficiency and tradition forever trump the worlds cheap plastic values and fake virtue signalling for "diversity" and conformity. For the farmer who drinks bourbon and the philosopher who still reads books on paper. Mans cologne of thought and action.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2006938"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2006938#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1992778" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; One of my favorite colognes ever. Its performance and longevity is ok. However, it makes up for it with an amazing scent that will for sure get you some compliments. Oh, it is also very versatile and could be worn in every situation imaginable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1992778"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1992778#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1988544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Only complaints is longevity sucks I find myself respraying also atomizer isn’t the best really eats up the juice quarter of the way gone after only 2 weeks of ownership</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1983312"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1983312#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978635" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1978635" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brain981"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535169"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1535169.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brain981" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Gucci/Guilty-Pour-Homme-Eau-de-Parfum-59987.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59987.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Guilty Pour Homme Eau de Parfum"title="Guilty Pour Homme Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1978635ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1978635" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535169">Brain981</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-17">11/17/23 03:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wasn't sure about it after an initial wear, but it has really grown on me. I get really good performance off my skin and have received numerous compliments. I love the simplicity of the scent. So much so I just ordered another bottle.<br />
<br />
IMO, signature scent worthy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1978635"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1978635#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1973138" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1973138" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nabojsa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1010732"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1010732.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nabojsa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1973138ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1973138" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1010732">nabojsa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-10">11/10/23 05:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Probably the most versatile and safe scent that you can get.<br />
It ticks all the boxes: it can be causal, sporty, elegant but also fresh and summery scent.<br />
Bottle looks very nice too, simplicity at its best.<br />
It is very weak though, but that's actually good because it makes it a good everyday "work" scent, you won't suffocate everyone around with it.<br />
Nothing great and extraordinary about it, but you really can't go wrong with this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1973138"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1973138#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1972749" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />

padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1708991">LeatherCouch</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-06">10/06/23 17:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm really convinced hero is one of the best contemporary generic perfumes ever created. It follows the contemporary trend of minimalistic design. Designed for compliments. Simple recipe blended masterfully to perfection. High quality ingredients. Citrus, juniper berries, black pepper and cedarwood oils. The result is a sophisticated ultra masculine luxurious shower gel. I love it and i can't get enough of it!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1945894"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1945894#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1908565" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1908565" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dumbplings"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dumbplings" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1908565ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1908565" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410281">Dumbplings</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 07:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is the best wood ever used in fragrance and when I say that I mean this is my favourite type of wood to smell out of any fragrance, the wood here is just done to perfection. Wood is actually quite a hard note to do correctly here it's amazing they picked the right type of woods, the right amount of wood and it smells like the quality of the wood is done well too. No stinky woods or green poisonous smelling woods used, only clean smelling woods. <br />
<br />
Also I think i'm the only person to notice this but I think it smells similar to Byredo Gypsy water which I also own a bottle of</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1808872">aidan_fragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-16">08/16/23 04:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i really liked the smell of this cologne, a comforting, woody, warm spicy scent that is hard to hate on. many people even told me i smell “spicy” wearing this lol.<br />
<br />
but the performance is what made me sell this, very weak. maybe would work for an office fragrance but personally i’d want something stronger. if they released this fragrance again but in a higher concentration i’d probably buy it.<br />
<br />
perfect for a blind buy or gift in terms of smell. more on the mature side but can be worn and liked by all ages.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1903358"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1903358#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1898607" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Ok...next</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1898607"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1898607#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1892073" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1892073" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bmcd921"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/858106"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bmcd921" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68627.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hero"title="Hero"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1892073ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1892073" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/858106">bmcd921</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-01">08/01/23 17:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don’t know what it is about this fragrance, but I REALLY enjoy it, and there’s room for it in my collection. I love the simplicity of the bottle design, the versatility and wearability of the fragrance itself - it just really does it for me. The reviews saying it’s nothing mind blowing are correct, but it’s also not another ambroxan or tonka bomb.  Clean, sophisticated, and safe. Definitely blind buy worthy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1892073"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1892073#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1889931" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1889931" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="washudtoj"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327091"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1327091.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="washudtoj" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/The-Body-Shop/Full-Ylang-Ylang-82679.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82679.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Full Ylang Ylang"title="Full Ylang Ylang"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1889931ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1889931" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327091">washudtoj</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-29">07/29/23 13:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like Lacoste l'Homme and YSL l'Homme.<br />
<br />
There's nothing wrong with this fragrance, really. The only problem is that it's been done a thousand times over and it offers nothing new. Smells nice, but boooooooooorrrrrrrrrring and as generic as it can be. As cedar fragrances go, I prefer l'Eau d'Issey pour Homme l'Eau de Cèdre. It's more polarising in the community, but at least it's not boring.<br />
<br />
At the end of the day, Burberry Hero does its job: makes you smell nice, but that's all it does. It might wow some people who don't know much about men's fragrances but it's completely mediocre to the learned noses. Just like Adam Driver: he acts, and that's all he does.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1889931"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1889931#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1888087" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1888087" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JusttheFactsMan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1733487.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JusttheFactsMan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bois-1920/Itruk-32129.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.32129.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Itruk"title="Itruk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1888087ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1888087" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1733487">JusttheFactsMan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-27">07/27/23 06:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>#184 in my "Tour de Fragrance"<br />
Burberry Hero<br />
Safe, Simple, Cedar<br />
<br />
Like all Burberry scents there's nothing out of the ordinary here. You end up with Juniper and Cedar, pleasant, inoffensive, mildly projecting, completely safe for office wear. This is a total snoozer, but the performance is at least middling with a cedar note that will make it to lunch. <br />
Not a bottle buy for me, but not an awful scent for workplace use.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1888087"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1888087#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1883095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1883095" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Xscent"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796857"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Xscent" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1883095ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1883095" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796857">Xscent</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-20">07/20/23 11:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not everything needs to be complex to be great. This is a linear and simple fragrance but done very well. A cedar based masculine scent. Subtle yet very manly and potentially extremely sexy if used during a summer date night. If she catches a whiff of this it won’t go unnoticed. Only drawback is longevity, about 6 hours but i think projection is as perfect as it is. It doesn’t need to be overpowering to work its magic</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1883095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1883095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1882116" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1882116" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lufragrance420"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1795500"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lufragrance420" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1882116ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1882116" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1882116"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1882116#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880338" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1880338" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BananaXango"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1655217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1655217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BananaXango" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Interlude-Black-Iris-60929.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60929.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Interlude Black Iris"title="Interlude Black Iris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1880338ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1880338" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1655217">BananaXango</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-16">07/16/23 19:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a basic but well-executed masculine fragrance. It was designed to sit squarely in the middle of safe market ground. In my mind it's reminiscent of some of the stronger men's colognes from the 1980's and it's appealing to the same type of wearer. Despite its simplicity it does have merit. It opens with a compelling raw bergamot smell, intermingled with juniper berry to give it deeper tone. There isn't much else to it but the wood. It smells good, is unambiguously male, and can be worn by nearly anyone.<br />
<br />
 The fragrance community might be disappointed by it but there is a good reason this is a best-seller in the US right now. It's a mass market departure from the Blues in a way that does not feel dated. The bottle design and marketing are communicating all of this pretty clearly too. It looks like a golden-hued brick with bold lettering, even moreso than Terre d'Hermes. In an calculating way that clarity makes it stand out even more on a shelf full of gaudy Paco Rabannes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1880338"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1880338#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1880317" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1880317" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="saulgoodman"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1778199"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1778199.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="saulgoodman" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1880317ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1880317" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1878237" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="monsieur.moustache"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1729574.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="monsieur.moustache" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1878237ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1878237" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1729574">monsieur.moustache</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-13">07/13/23 20:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opening is woody. Dry down is powdery/woody. Overall, a fairly versatile fragrance though not an extremely compelling one.<br />
<br />
6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1878237"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1878237#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1873889" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1873889" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="DichterundDenker"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1783271"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1783271.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="DichterundDenker" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1873889ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1873889" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1783271">DichterundDenker</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-08">07/08/23 03:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Slightly acidic with a light metallic note. Everything is a little soft here, the cedar, the juniper and the pepper. You won't stand out with this fragrance and most will like Burberry Hero. It is suitable for all seasons.<br />
<br />
The scent didn't excite me. Especially in the drydown, the Hero gets slightly stinging. A property that is often found in cedar scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1873889"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1873889#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1872437" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1872437" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BallSniffer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1558402"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1558402.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BallSniffer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Scandal-Pour-Homme-68074.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68074.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scandal Pour Homme"title="Scandal Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1872437ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1872437" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1558402">BallSniffer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-06">07/06/23 06:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find it amusing when a designer fragrance is called generic and isn't remotely similar to anything else.<br />
<br />
Hero by Burberry is like stepping into a fresh cedar forest on a brisk morning.<br />
<br />
I can't help but compare it to Dior Homme 2020; while Dior takes you on a crisp, clean journey with its breezy and effervescent vibes, Burberry's Hero is like the rugged and adventurous sibling.<br />
<br />
Versatile and masculine</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1872437"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1872437#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1872222" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1872222" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="astrid1057"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1388088"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1388088.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="astrid1057" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Juliette-90396.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90396.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Juliette"title="Juliette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1872222ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1872222" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1388088">astrid1057</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-05">07/05/23 21:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This review is from the POV of a woman in her early 20s. I received a sample and immediately loved it and gave it to my boyfriend to wear. It smells like a very attractive man I would feel comfortable around. Sweet, reminds me a little of shampoo, but nothing light or fruity. It’s very pleasant and would be great for summer or daytime. My boyfriend and I compared it to Burberry Hero EDP and both agreed this is the winner. The bottle is nice and classic, not too flashy just like the scent. I would recommend and also convinced my boyfriend to get it lol.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1872222"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1872222#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1868503" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1615976">410RudyRuuu</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-30">06/30/23 22:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>WEAR THIS IN THE HEAT, 80° or hotter, will improve performance immensely <br />
<br />
i get good projection and easily 8 hours off this<br />
<br />
i wear to work, tried it in the spring, did ok, wearing it in the summer and now it's a beast</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1868503"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1868503#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1868370" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1868370" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Psalzarulo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Psalzarulo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1868370ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1868370" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1723203">Psalzarulo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-30">06/30/23 18:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think Hero is a great name for this masculine, somewhat warm and powdery, slightly sweet cologne. The notes are simple but very clear. This is a very understated scent that doesn't offer much from afar but up close is very nice. <br />
<br />
This could easily be a signature scent and should work for men of all ages, although I do think this would fit a more quiet, understated type of person. 7.5/10 on scent. It does smell nice but nothing I'd go out of my way to smell, yet at the same time it would be a great blind buy. If you consider price then this could easily be an 8 or 8.5/10 scent.<br />
<br />
After a couple of months with the sample, I'm bumping my overall score to an 8.5/10. This is just a really great, everyday, casual scent that I could see myself buying one day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1868370"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1868370#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1866563" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238637">girldeadbug</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-28">06/28/23 10:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Burberry Hero EDT: A warm, soft, fuzzy, woody frag. Would make a nice gift for a man just entering the fragrance world, but a woman could rock it as well. Not loud, not a whisper, perfect in between. I like it a lot more than Hero EDP. Great job Burberry.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1866563"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1866563#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1866186" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1866186" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="pilotdc"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587795"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1587795.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="pilotdc" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1866186ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1866186" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1587795">pilotdc</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-27">06/27/23 21:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Upon first sprays, it doesn't seem like this edt will perform well. While Hero is not a strong fragrance, it does give some sillage and lasts a few hours. If you like woodsy and spicy perfumes like I do, it sure could be a signature/wear anywhere anytime scent, or a good inoffensive work fragrance. You can get 5 oz bottles for great prices</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1866186"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1866186#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1864794" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1864794" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Basman0"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249463"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1249463.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Basman0" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Antinomie/Neroli-Poete-75109.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75109.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Néroli Poète"title="Néroli Poète"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1864794ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1864794" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1249463">Basman0</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-26">06/26/23 06:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's completely fine and wearable for every day.<br />
If the price drops to where other Burberry scents are. ( Like 40 bucks) i can completely understand people making this their signature scent.<br />
Right now i feel that scents like Explorer and Dylan blue will have more of a wow effect for a cheaper price. <br />
<br />
In general i personally like to wear something different that makes me stand out and i gladly pay a little more for that so this is not for me. <br />
In a world where everything in a perfume store at least smells nice, this for 70 bucks for a 100 ml is not a great pick up.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1864794"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1864794#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1856420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
