Mainly get Cedar and Juniper. Fresh and woody scent. Safe for warmer weather. Office and casual wear. Mass appealing scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1839843"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1839843#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1839629" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1839629" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JasKiew"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611442"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1611442.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JasKiew" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Afnan/Historic-Olmeda-75670.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75670.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Historic Olmeda"title="Historic Olmeda"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1839629ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1839629" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611442">JasKiew</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-22">05/22/23 19:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This just came in...<br />
Initially nose gives me a typical mass Appealing designer scent, something along the lines of CK Deny Edp<br />
Then it settles down fast to a very nice very lovely woody cedar scent.<br />
Should be a compliment getter<br />
<br />
Hero Edt comes with a very nice solid metallic cap, as good or better than Doors<br />
I tried to shake it very hard and it still holds solidly</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1839629"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1839629#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1837775" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1837775" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chasescentsss"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727417"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1727417.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chasescentsss" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1837775ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1837775" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1727417">Chasescentsss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-20">05/20/23 10:48</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very nice Woody cologne with a spicy twist. It’s extremely masculine and I love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1837775"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1837775#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1835100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1835100" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Parfumpop"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1566092"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1566092.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Parfumpop" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfumane/Sacred-Palace-79324.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79324.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sacred Palace"title="Sacred Palace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1835100ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1835100" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1566092">Parfumpop</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-17">05/17/23 04:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It smells unique, mass appealing and uplifting. The woody base balances the sweetness. Despite the uninspiring bottle, I was pleasantly surprised. Performance is good but not worth the full price. Not an everyday option after real-world use, especially in hot weather. Strong projection fades with moderate longevity</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1835100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1835100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1835085" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1835085" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CyberGene"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/877538"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="CyberGene" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1835085ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1835085" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/877538">CyberGene</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-17">05/17/23 03:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'll first start with a story. Almost 30 years ago, as a high school student, I purchased a cheap Imperial Leather deodorant, a green one. It was a typical fresh masculine fragrance with lots of pine/juniper notes. Well, it proved to be a an absolute magnet for schoolgirls and I often received compliments from them. Mind you, I wasn't a popular guy, so, yeah, that fragrance kind of made me popular :) It wasn't my cup of tea though but I didn't hate it. And actually I thought it smelled more expensive than it really was. I haven't encountered a similar fragrance recently.<br />
<br />
Well, I got some samples from a beauty store today, and when I finally sprayed the Burberry Hero on a paper I immediately got those old memories of that Imperial Leather deodorant and all these girls that were mad about it. I don't know whether the Burberry Hero and that Imperial Leather deo are exactly the same, I'm only relying on 30 years of fading memory but I'd say they are in the same ballpark. And while it may sound like comparing the Hero to some cheap deodorant, that was not my idea. It's a very nice and masculine fragrance that you can't go wrong with. It's not one of those masterpieces that everybody talks about, it's also not one of these polarizing fragrances that people love or hate. It's just a very nice, above average quality, well-crafted and safe fragrance with old school hints (no pun intended), fresh, manly, assertive but not overpowering. I'm not sure I would purchase it and I will have to demo it to my wife and see whether she would act as a teenage schoolgirl (pun intended).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1835085"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1835085#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1834969" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1834969" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="czajnik"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662959"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1662959.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="czajnik" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dolce-Gabbana/The-One-For-Men-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-59313.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59313.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The One For Men Eau de Parfum Intense"title="The One For Men Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1834969ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1834969" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1662959">czajnik</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-16">05/16/23 23:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got this as a small sample, and from the first sniff off the atomizer I thought - nice! I like the woodiness of this, with a lot of cedar. It's the note I like in other perfumes, plus juniper is ingredient for gin, my favourite spirit. Pleasant smell, but I have to say that I can't pick it up from my clother after few hours, it could last longer.<br />
I still need to compare this one to EDP I also have for tests, but I believe the notes are slightly different as well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1834969"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1834969#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1832459" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1832459" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Palosanto"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/115404"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.115404.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Palosanto" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Natura/Essencial-Intenso-35294.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.35294.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Essencial Intenso"title="Essencial Intenso"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1832459ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1832459" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/115404">Palosanto</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-13">05/13/23 19:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hero is manly, woody, and fresh. No sweetness or something horribly chemical here. Mr. Guichard's professional hand can be detected in this product. And though the fragrance is not particularly distinctive it is indeed very "nice". It lasts some 6/7 hours and projects discreetly. It is a very "professional" office scent. Is it bad? Not at all: it does very well what it has been designed to do. Is it particularly memorable? Certainly not. Try it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1832459"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1832459#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1832411" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1832411" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bolancb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029838"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1029838.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="bolancb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-Amber-Pour-Homme-Intense-11240.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.11240.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada Amber Pour Homme Intense"title="Prada Amber Pour Homme Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1832411ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1832411" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029838">bolancb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-13">05/13/23 17:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>WHAT A MASTERPIECE BY ONE OF MY FAVORITE PERFUMERS! Simple but Manly from young to old….. woman/ Men I’ve received compliments just wanted this EDT to be stronger! I see a lot of reviews saying for the office safe blah blah blah! IMHO ITS SO VERSATILE, on a cool summer night wearing this to a lounge/bar Latin club salsa 💃 dancing would be a lady KILLER!!! One love ❤️✌️on earth 🌍</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1832411"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1832411#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1828646" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1828646" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hiteshvs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1745812"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="hiteshvs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1828646ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1828646" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1745812">hiteshvs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-09">05/09/23 10:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Hero EDT is clearly very spicy and woodsy and it's same characteristics stay until the end. However, it's not new smell. I find it very close to Dior Savage. Someone who doesn't want to spend 100$ to test this one can buy Ajmal Kuro (also a clone of Dior Savage). It's about 85% clone of Hero with super beast mode projection and longevity. It will be available at around 20$ or so. Hero is not worth the price I feel and also the blend is not that great. I would rate it 5.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1828646"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1828646#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1824216" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1824216" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LOUDPACK"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687713"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1687713.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LOUDPACK" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1824216ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1824216" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1687713">LOUDPACK</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-03">05/03/23 16:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very woodsy, very fresh, very nonoffensive, but also very generic. It’s not a bad scent, but you’ve probably smelt something very similar before in other popular fragrance.<br />
<br />
I haven’t really seen this comparison before, but it kind of reminds me of LNDL by YSL. I think it’s the bergamot/cedar with a hint of spiciness that makes these scents pretty similar. But LNDL smells way more sexy/interesting/delicious than Hero. Hero kind of smells like LNDL’s depressed younger brother, haha.<br />
<br />
Overall not too bad. Not really interested in buying a decant/bottle, but I can see how this can appeal to some. It’s a great office fragrance due to it being nonoffensive, clean and manly. But it doesn’t wow me a whole lot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1824216"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1824216#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1822958" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1822958" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cengizhannn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1676865"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cengizhannn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1822958ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1822958" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); Hero is dry and weak, relying only on three cedar woods for its strength. Differentiating the scents is a mystery. I'm at the beginning</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1822958"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1822958#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1818300" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1677464">Greatnessss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-04-07">04/07/23 01:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I think it would be a great fragrance for everyday use, especially for the office. It has a bit of character but it won't bother anyone. The performance is medium, which is good for me. I don't always want a super strong and aggressive fragrance.<br />
What about the bottle? I think it's very sleek and modern. I love it! I'm really happy I bought Burberry Hero and I can't wait to wear it more often.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1802708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1802708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1790724" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1790724" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ashdenies"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672174"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1672174.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ashdenies" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1790724ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1790724" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1672174">ashdenies</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-23">03/23/23 10:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The notes say it all. Very woodsy, with a splash of bright bergamot in the opening and spicy, aromatic nuances throughout. A safe perfume if you're looking for something masculine and woodsy that isn't likely to offend people. A bit too safe for my tastes, but I wouldn't mind sitting next to someone who was wearing this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1790724"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1790724#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1786544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; So, you have now two of these to pick from.😁</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1786544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1786544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1779539" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; <br />
Pleasant enough, no personality.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1779539"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1779539#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1772842" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1201063">petshopb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-26">02/26/23 09:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very citrusy, very simple, very good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1750609" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Beniamin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1650193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Beniamin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1750609ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1750609" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); Really pleasing. I’d call in the perfect office scent. Only fragrance that got any compliments at work.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1750609"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1750609#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1748236" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1748236" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="neodave"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334999"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="neodave" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1748236ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1748236" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1334999">neodave</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-31">01/31/23 09:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me it shares some similarities with Dior Homme 2020. At the current prices though I would choose DH 2020. If this makes it down to the Touch price range it will definitely be worthy of a full bottle purchase. The market is flooded with samples so I'm hoping it will be sooner rather than later. Between the EDT and EDP I much prefer EDT.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1748236"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1748236#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1743433" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1743433" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bashar11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670560"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bashar11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1743433ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1743433" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1670560">bashar11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-25">01/25/23 17:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In two words: Quality, Understated. It's not challenging or head turning, rather its understated and mass appealing. Making it great for the office and daily use. The minimalist bottle allows you to really appreciate the little details. It exudes quality, very heavy and solid feeling in the hand and the weighty magnetic top adds to that. The color contrasted atomizer is really good, maybe amongst the best, which is a good thing because you will need quite a few sprays of this to have it project and last. The fragrance notes do not contrast or change over time, rather they merge into one singular understated olfactory experience which is a fresh yet dark wood. Its smells familiar and comforting but you can never quite put your finger on what it is which is what keeps drawing you back for more.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1743433"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1743433#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1741738" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1736439" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sammyboysmells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1618494"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="sammyboysmells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1736439ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1736439" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); Something you can wear day to day in any environment or under any circumstance. Whilst it’s a great compliment getter in the summertime, it heavily underperforms in the wintertime.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1736439"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1736439#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1729461" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1729461" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NYCActuary"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263770"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263770.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NYCActuary" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1729461ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1729461" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263770">NYCActuary</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-09">01/09/23 10:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's not my favorite.  It's like a slightly woodsy take on 1million.  Reminds me of a scented pinecone. If that is your scent, you will like this a lot.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1729461"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1729461#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1728178" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1728178" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="enzoespin"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645365"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1645365.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="enzoespin" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1728178ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1728178" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1645365">enzoespin</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-07">01/07/23 21:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really like this! Sure, it's nothing ground-breaking, but it's probably my most worn fragrance. Super mass-appealing and its simplicity is what makes it great IMO. It's like every male fragrance mixed together. It's citrusy, woodsy, metallic, musky, fresh, and aquatic all at the same time. Opening is great but the dry-down is fantastic- a super clean smelling, slightly soapy citrus which I really love. I dont really think it's "dated" as many say. Just an all around great fragrance that's an easy reach. Only complaint is the longevity but it does its job. I get like a solid 6 hours with this usually. 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1728178"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1728178#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1723595" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1723595" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="z2"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1644132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1644132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="z2" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-410.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.410.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gio"title="Acqua di Gio"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1723595ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1723595" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1644132">z2</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-02">01/02/23 20:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>one of the more basic smelling perfumes. If you tell any regular person to describe cologne, chances are it'd smell like Burberry Hero. But, I like it because it's a nice fragrance and I think it can be worn all 4 seasons. Though mainly in the spring/summer/fall, I do think you can get away with this in the winter too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1723595"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1723595#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1714576" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1714576" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brdnz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428153"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brdnz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1714576ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1714576" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1428153">Brdnz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-21">12/21/22 19:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly i wanted to love this for the fact that is a SUPER generic easy versatile scent. All the way through you get a dry aromatic slightly spice coniferous cedar and it's something that i've smelled a million times, really reminds me of a body wash. <br />
<br />
With that being said this stuff smells absolutley fantastic and is super mass appealing but the probelm is that it is just sooo weak. The fragrace is very thin and airy to begin with and a single spray to the wrist is hardly detectable and drowing myself in this it becomes a vague skin scent in 30 min</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1714576"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1714576#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1714153" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1713620"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1713620#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1712756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1712756" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="doodluv"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1386268"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1386268.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="doodluv" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Carlisle-33514.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.33514.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Carlisle"title="Carlisle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1712756ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1712756" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1386268">doodluv</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-19">12/19/22 11:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The most 'whatever' I've felt for a fragrance. <br />
<br />
It's clean, it smells good, but in a clean and smells good way that reminds me of slightly above average room air freshener with random sky blue packaging like Febreeze. How pathetically weak it is + the slight soapiness also contributes to this air freshener feel.<br />
<br />
Nothing special about this at all, no twist, no mystery note that keeps you coming back for more.<br />
 <br />
It is totally devoid of personality and completely unmemorable. Your life would be exactly the same if you have or have not smelt this fragrance. Just pass on it and spend your money elsewhere.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1712756"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1712756#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1711277" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1711277" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rafrosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321272"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1321272.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rafrosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1711277ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1711277" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1321272">Rafrosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-17">12/17/22 09:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Simple scent but absolutely beautiful imo. I love crisp, airy, masculine fragrances and this is just that. The note breakdown is a simple and fairly accurate description of what you are getting with this one. Fresh woods, clean/airy juniper with a touch of bergamot and pepper. There is a very slight soapiness to the scent. Even though it is not listed, I would assume there is a lavender note in here.  Perhaps the overall scent could be described as a simpler, smoother, far more wearable version of Santal 33. The scent is extremely versatile - casual to formal, warm or cold- it’s a modern masculine scent that just works. Love this one, just wish performance was better. Will need to overspray for this to last more than 3hrs.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1711277"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1711277#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1708847" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1611741">ZDML22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-04">12/04/22 21:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This was a blind buy after seeing ads. Now, I do think it's on the safe buy in terms of blind buys, but I don't have any great remarks to have it a clear blind purchase. The smell is good, I don't think it will offend anyone, at least the grand majority will like. I wore it only during the days, for casual things like getting lunch, or shopping around. I can not see it as a date night, or overall, any nighttime activity go to fragrance.<br />
6.5 out of 10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1702287"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1702287#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1692274" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1689212" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dumbplings"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410281"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dumbplings" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1689212ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1689212" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1410281">Dumbplings</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-15">11/15/22 18:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Woody, fresh, sweet, powdery, soapy, citrusy, sexy, peppery, slightly floral and most of all this is not boring.<br />
<br />
You would think there is vetiver in here because of that peppery wood smell, but it's just actual pepper with wood. But it smells like vetiver<br />
<br />
Something in here smells like pdm percival (must be the powdery &amp; woody smell)  to me and then sometimes when I smell it then it's a bit like dior homme 2020</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1680971" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BenD"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589268"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="BenD" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1680971ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1680971" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1589268">BenD</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-11-04">11/04/22 12:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am in love with this fragrance. Smells uncomplicated and sophisticated, safe but not boring. I think it works well for any occasion, but may not be perfect for any occasion. Not ideal performance or projection but unless you want to shout out your presence with the way you smell its fine. It definitely isn't a 'wear you' cologne. I'm introverted, but not shy. Hero fits my personality perfectly.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1680971"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1680971#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1677265" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1659746" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AmoreProfumi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/170873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.170873.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AmoreProfumi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1659746ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1659746" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/170873">AmoreProfumi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-05">10/05/22 15:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Finally had the chance to test this at my local ulta.. I thought judging by the notes that it be heavily woody and bordering old manish (where I almost didn’t give it a chance) but was presently surprised it was a lot brighter and fresher and clean smelling and not so old at all, so nice I had to test it on and now I think I need it! It’s definitely cedar-y but the citrus really helps round it out..and I get a slight powdery-ness like in Dior Homme 2020 edtn. But if anything I get really nice expensive clean woody soap and I likes! But yes definitely one to look into if you’re into fresh cedar/woody scents &amp; don’t want to totally smell like you just rubbed bark on you.<br />
  <br />
Update: only negativity it’s 4 hours later.. and it’s barely detectable :/.. I mean I still like it though..think just some samples will suffice though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1659746"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1659746#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1654781" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; only problem how long is last</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1654781"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1654781#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1652143" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1652143" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="XOXO_marcel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571392"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1571392.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="XOXO_marcel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tous/Tous-Gems-Party-66524.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66524.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tous Gems Party"title="Tous Gems Party"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1652143ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1652143" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1571392">XOXO_marcel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-24">09/24/22 17:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Well, this is a new favorite of mine! I wasn't expecting to like it, as Burberry is just about my least favorite house. However, this turned out to be a pleasant, well-balanced woodsy scent. It has the feeling of a real, natural forest. I can imagine this on a rich young guy who enjoys hunting. It isn't "exciting" by any means, but it's definitely high-quality and it would be perfect for someone with rustic class.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1652143"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1652143#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1648695" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1648695" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CanadianSmells"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1554412"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1554412.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CanadianSmells" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1648695ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1648695" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1554412">CanadianSmells</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-09-19">09/19/22 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wow. <br />
Is the instant reaction I had smelling this at Sephora!<br />
With no ad campaign knowledge or other biases, I tried different scents. This one stuck with me.<br />
I had also smelled popular blue fragrances , but HERO is the one that attracted my nose the most!<br />
<br />
It is envigorating. The peppery woods base is Masculine. Fresh and clean.<br />
« Outdoors » is a word that comes to mind.<br />
Nice projection at the start, but weak longevity overall…<br />
<br />
Got a 100ML bottle at discounters for almost half of what retail was in 2021. It is worth a pickup at a discount IMO.<br />
<br />
Scent is a solid 9.4/10, but it’s overall a 7.5 for me due to weak longevity on skin.<br />
Have to agree with other commenters, girlfriend LOVES it ;)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1648695"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1648695#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1638158" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
