Very inviting and unpretentious. Nothing too profound happening here, but it's okay. We forgive this guy because he's so affable.<br />
<br />
I'd say if you have a jolly uncle type in your life and they have a birthday coming up, this would make a great gift.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1634392"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1634392#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1631451" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1631451" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xtal01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="xtal01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Extreme-30499.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30499.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Extreme"title="Spicebomb Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1631451ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1631451" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1535569">xtal01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-25">08/25/22 18:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like ikea. Woody but not spicy, wood vibes with a hint of citrus. Nice inoffensive fragrance for everyday wear.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1631451"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1631451#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1629885" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1629885" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="alien_with_blue_eyes"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1427827"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1427827.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="alien_with_blue_eyes" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1629885ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1629885" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1427827">alien_with_blue_eyes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-23">08/23/22 15:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didn't expect that I would like it so much, but it was love at first smell ❤ Gentle, unobtrusive, fresh at the beginning and later you feel a fine cedar. A scent for every day, for all situations!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1629885"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1629885#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1629138" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1629138" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="norm1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1291895"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1291895.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="norm1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1629138ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1629138" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1291895">norm1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-22">08/22/22 13:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Burberry Hero is about 'Getting It Right'. <br />
    Notes: Top: Bergamot     Middle: Juniper, Black Pepper     Base: Atlas Cedar (Morocco--thank you Fragrantica) Virginia Cedar, Himalayan Cedar<br />
    You want to have fun with fragrance?  Real Fun?  Then pretend you have a dial in your nose for the various "types" of fragrance.   You know. .   A Juicy Couture setting, A Roja Dove setting, a holiday at the department store setting, designer setting, niche setting. an animalic setting if you dare. <br />
Aside:   I actually enjoy Juicy Couture Qui or Malibu. . . sometimes spray a room with it I love it so much.  Alittle Lolita Lempicka Au Masculine for the anise and decisive blend; alittle Sisley for the delicate drift--class in whispers.  OK--overexplained the hell out of that one.  <br />
     Expectations in tune with reality but just plain sexy and real.  That is Hero.  Right around $75 <br />
 USD it is just outside the 'highly affordable'.  If you like British Traditional approach to fragrance, you will adore this fragrance.  I like Dunhill Custom with its Black Pepper so this is just perfect for me.  I confess, I am a Dunhill fanboy to the hilt and now I am Burberry gone wild.<br />
    Abstract on Burberry Hero:<br />
     Burberry Hero is a daily reality scent with the ability to dream big.  It is romantic and faces the world with what works-- darn it.  It has the magic of attraction in great abundance, but the car just drove by and spewed wet mud on your pant leg.  Raining again.  <br />
     For after all is said and done, our Heros are everyday people that try hard to get it right. The hero is not always trumpeted in glory.<br />
    Nothing weird, esoteric, exclusive--just wonderful and here for all.<br />
   I think that getting it right really feels good.  And here it even smells good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1629138"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1629138#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1627918" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1627918" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tlbands"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556267"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="tlbands" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1627918ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1627918" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1556267">tlbands</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-20">08/20/22 16:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My everyday scent and my girlfriend adores it as much as I do. Far from overpowering sillage which makes it great for everyday wear. Seems suitable for all weather types. Great longevity on the skin and smells even better as the hours pass although it does fairly quickly transition into an intimate scent with very little sillage. A very masculine scent in my opinion. It's actually great value too which is rare for a scent of this quality. Try it for something different, it will keep them guessing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1627918"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1627918#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1623633" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1623633" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="EthanMk17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538103"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="EthanMk17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Viktor-Rolf/Spicebomb-Extreme-30499.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.30499.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spicebomb Extreme"title="Spicebomb Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1623633ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1623633" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1538103">EthanMk17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-14">08/14/22 13:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I Recently Tested Burberry Hero, The citrus Bergamot opening is very minimal and intimate. This is before it sets into the dark but yet sweet Juniper Berry with added Black Pepper creating a fresh but yet spicy scent whilst still remaining mysterious. But the star of the show is of course the many types of Cedar wood in the base notes. Don't get me wrong, I cannot tell the difference between the Cedars but it is still a nice touch.<br />
<br />
Performance:  On skin it lasted me around 6-7 Hours. On clothing I found that it lasted less time, with around 5/6 Hours.<br />
Overall: I believe that this scent is meant for fall/spring use as it doesn't perform too well in summer. Its definitely a fragrance for the older man as its more sophisticated but yet so simplistic in its notes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1623633"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1623633#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1619808" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1619808" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="wristmeetrazor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1511374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1511374.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="wristmeetrazor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1619808ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1619808" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1511374">wristmeetrazor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-08">08/08/22 19:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>reminds me of a lush bath bomb, not sure which one tho. maybe the dragon egg?<br />
<br />
not bad tho. lasts a decent amount of time but projects lightly. i can see this being worth picking up when/if it hits discounters for $30-40 like other burberry frags, otherwise i wouldn’t pick up a full bottle</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1619808"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1619808#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1618290" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1618290" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HunterB10X"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243050"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1243050.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="HunterB10X" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Eau-Extreme-14669.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14669.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme"title="Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1618290ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1618290" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1243050">HunterB10X</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-06">08/06/22 13:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ignore the selective hate, apparently directed towards this fragrance 🤷🏼♂️. But Burberry Hero EDT for what it is, is a very nice fragrance 💯. Is it the greatest fragrance EVER? Is it comparable quality wise w Burberry clothing, or leather goods? Of course not.. And who cares? With that being said, Hero is perfect for everyday wear in the Spring and Summer. Probably even in the Fall too? Hero is loaded w cedar and has enough juniper in it to balance the sweetness out. I do 5-7 sprays, sometimes 8, and I get a solid 7-8 hours of performance. Which is more than acceptable. If you can get this between 60-70$? Then, by all means do so. My final score is 8/10. And I’m glad, that I decided to add this to my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1618290"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1618290#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1617262" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1617262" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="molecularentropy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515005"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1515005.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="molecularentropy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Azzaro/Wanted-Tonic-59733.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59733.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Wanted Tonic"title="Wanted Tonic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1617262ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1617262" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1515005">molecularentropy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-08-05">08/05/22 00:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a basic scent. It's not going to challenge you, or break any moulds, but I do like it. Fresh, woody, comforting, and masculine. If I had to peg this into some category, it would go into the dumb-reach section. Office? Yes. Casual days out? Definitely. Home? Uh-huh. Gym? You can get away with it. Date? She may not be impressed, but she definitely won't hate it.<br />
<br />
Performance is good, and lasts a decent amount of time. I apply this twice a day when I choose it as my scent-of-the-day. It's a safe blind buy. If you like cedar and juniper there's no way you're not going to at least be okay with having this in your collection.<br />
<br />
Edit: Decided to not just hypothesise, and put my money where my mouth is. Wore it on a date. She actually loved it. Said it was so much better than what I wore last time (Prada Luna Rossa Black). So there you go. At least one girl liked it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1617262"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1617262#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1592788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1592788" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jonathanelsher3"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523410"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1523410.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jonathanelsher3" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Hugo-570.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.570.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hugo"title="Hugo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1592788ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1592788" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523410">Jonathanelsher3</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-28">06/28/22 03:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very fresh, spicy, and woody fragrance that is simple, basic yet unique, and pleasant. The perfect balance of spicy and sweet in this cedar-based scent is something I really love about it. <br />
The bottle and the packaging are beautiful and its performance is superb too. This is the kind of fragrance that can not go wrong. Worth a blind buy and gift for sure. Marvelous one!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1592788"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1592788#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1588584" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1588584" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hijoebye"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1323365"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1323365.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="hijoebye" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1588584ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1588584" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1323365">hijoebye</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-21">06/21/22 07:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Burberry Hero reminds me of a less elegant Dior Homme 2020 or a not so daring Bleu de Chanel. It's a fresh, citrus and wood scent and it's a totally fine fragrance. But that's all it is. Not revolutionary nor groundbreaking but perfectly acceptable in what it's trying to do. If you like it, I suggest waiting as they will likely end up at your favorite discount department stores soon.<br />
I would describe this as comfortably unoriginal.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1588584"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1588584#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1583047" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1583047" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lostsoul007"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226753"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1226753.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lostsoul007" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Terre-d-Hermes-17.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Terre d'Hermès"title="Terre d'Hermès"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1583047ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1583047" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1226753">lostsoul007</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-12">06/12/22 12:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sure, you could call this boring or generic, but one thing it isn’t, is unpleasant… this just works.  Personally, I don’t find it out of place in Burberry’s collection… Touch was (and still is) very popular and it’s basically a fresh musk.  The brand has never really jumped out and created anything extraordinary, yet does well with easy, mass appealing fragrances which are carefully curated within current trends, IMO.  <br />
<br />
This DNA is absolutely simple, and that’s what’s selling atm… look at Dior Homme 2020, Dior Homme Sport, Molecule 01, Santal 33, Terre D’Hermes, Royal Oud, This Is Not A Perfume / Intense (or whatever it is) and so on… Could they have done more with this fragrance? Sure, but why bother?  Dior took the molecule of Ambroxin with Sauvage and created a modern masterpiece (loosely) and a billion dollar fragrance line with it… essentially re-branding Dior Homme with hopes of the same success using ISO-E Super.   These days, simplicity works, minimalism, the urban lumberjack hipster, smell like you just left the wood-shop or live in a van down by the river… I can see the appeal.  <br />
<br />
The average costumer looking for a lite, fresh, modern, versatile, mass pleasing scent with decent staying power to wear to work (or casually) will no doubt find this pleasant, and most likely have no problem dishing out the funds for it at retail.  Also, I find the bottle attractive… it’s functional and minimalistic, like TDH or BDC.<br />
<br />
I’m not saying this fragrance is exactly what I’ve been looking for since I already own the aforementioned, but I wouldn’t mind picking this up at a decent price… it would get some wear and no doubt pull some positive attention.   Performance may leave a bit to be desired… the times I’ve worn it I probably got a good hour before it faded into a VERY lite skin scent… I wouldn’t pay more that $40 for a 100mL and just go ham on the trigger… transitional seasons are most optimal for best reaults.   <br />
<br />
SOTN:  Initio Side Effect</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1583047"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1583047#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1579631" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1579631" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Lom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/455961"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.455961.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Lom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Frederic-Malle/L-Eau-d-Hiver-2797.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2797.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Eau d'Hiver"title="L'Eau d'Hiver"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1579631ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1579631" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/455961">Lom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-07">06/07/22 12:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Burberry always seems like a confused brand, never managing to find its path. But this is just ridiculous. Why launch such an unpleasant and unexciting perfume? I had to wipe this off of my hand the two times I tested it. If it is aimed at teenagers then maybe I get it. Just another meh designer fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1579631"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1579631#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1574203" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1574203" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bb101011"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263810"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bb101011" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1574203ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1574203" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263810">bb101011</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-30">05/30/22 14:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not bad. This is like a designer version of Royal Oud by Creed.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1574203"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1574203#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1570580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1570580" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MadamNijinsky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1215341"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1215341.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MadamNijinsky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1570580ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1570580" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1215341">MadamNijinsky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-24">05/24/22 21:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very masculine and likeable, almost comforting in a way. Not bold or overpowering. I would definitely like smelling it on a man.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1570580"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1570580#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1570553" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1570553" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sydneycmck"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383225"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1383225.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sydneycmck" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/L-Interdit-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-62491.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.62491.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Intense"title="L'Interdit Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1570553ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1570553" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383225">sydneycmck</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-24">05/24/22 20:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Opens very bright and spicy, and I would actually argue that the pepper is more so closer to the top notes, as I can't really smell it in the drydown. The juniper brings something gentle and sexy, and allows the fragrance to be more inviting rather than being a typical punchy and offensive cologne; I just want to keep burying my face in the paper sample lol. The cedar is pretty light and not too strong. The fragrance sits close to the skin, and longevity is just ok. I think this scent is perfect for brief events or intimate occasions.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1570553"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1570553#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1562405" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1562405" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vat1cano"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414481"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1414481.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vat1cano" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1562405ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1562405" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1414481">Vat1cano</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-12">05/12/22 11:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's a good fragrance. It's very versatile. You can wear it for any occasion. Not a fresh fragrance but very woodsy dominate.<br />
<br />
Not a fan of the commercial.. The guy is on a beach with a horse swimming in water which gave me the impression it would be  a refreshing elegant scent.. Yeah Definiately not refreshing. There aren't any damn trees on that beach either. There is a disconnect  Commercial And the fragrance. <br />
<br />
It wouldve been better to have this guy on the beach sitting infront of a beach bonfire. Because that's the impression I have with this smell. A nightat the beach infront of fire</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1562405"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1562405#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1556758" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1556758" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="WGG"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360297"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1360297.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="WGG" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1556758ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1556758" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1360297">WGG</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-04">05/04/22 05:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Based on a carded sample.  Anyone remember Vimto?  This is Vimto with some woods.  I get more sweetness than shown in the notes.  This is a decent enough scent for everyday wear, albeit a like not a love.<br />
3/5</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1556758"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1556758#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1554689" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
