padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029838">bolancb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-01">05/01/22 10:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my s*** right here masculine sensual sexyyyyy A/F versatile Day/Night/Bar lounge/Clubbing I'll layer this bad boy w Iso e super molecules 01 and BAM BABYYYY! I can't wait till they drop the EDP or Parfum version! ✌🏼❤️🔥🔥🔥</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1554689"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1554689#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1548352" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1548352" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ski808"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378317"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1378317.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ski808" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1548352ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1548352" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378317">ski808</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-21">04/21/22 23:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I dropped by Sephora yesterday and the sales girl just handed out the tester strip as if she knew I had to try it. I normally wouldn't given how much of a scent snob I've turned into. Burberry who? Boy was I surprised after the first whiff. This is sooo GOOD. It's so relaxing. It's modern. It's like a fresh scent and luxurious too. Images of gold flecks in liquid come to mind after forming my 30 second mental conclusion. Later I found out it had juniper which is my favourite ingredient. It's an intimate fragrance, and I didn't stick around long enough to see if it's longevity is any worse. Though it is simplistic in composition, the opening and the mid notes reveal otherwise. I particularly like that. In the comments this has been somewhat compared to TdH, similar, ish, but not quite in my opinion, but they both do pander to that same luxurious direction. But this is not as heavy as TdH while Hero is a lighter fragrance. I like! For the price I believe I'd want one. I'll just have to keep spraying it. Since it's a Burberry fragrance, I'd wait for a really good discount and snag three bottles because it's that unique. At the same time, as good as it is, I'd rank this below TdH just for readers' perspective. BUT. This is my modern juniper.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1548352"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1548352#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1542424" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1542424" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Houdini4"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.607493.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Houdini4" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Indemodables/Vanille-Havane-Coeur-de-Oud-96892.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96892.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"title="Vanille Havane Coeur de Oud"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1542424ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1542424" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/607493">Houdini4</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-13">04/13/22 06:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Functional.<br />
Pedestrian. <br />
The Beige box says everything. <br />
However, I like it.<br />
 I think that says quite a bit about the landscape of designer men's releases at the moment if something as mediocre as this actually appears nicer in comparison to an abysmal backdrop. <br />
I genuinely couldn't tell you what this smells like. I'm not being mean about it, just incompetent as a reviewer that's all.<br />
 I must reiterate I like it, but it's not exciting enough to recall in any great detail. Is it a citrus? Softly spicy and herbal I'd say? Maybe?<br />
The notes say bergamot, black pepper, juniper and cedar, I mean if ever you were going to make a generic, man-jus, it would sound like that, but to me it's different from that even, it's softer and muskier than that note list would imply. <br />
Get it in a bargain bucket somewhere in a few months/years and I'm there.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1542424"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1542424#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1538605" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1538605" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TopPicksByNick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1451442"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="TopPicksByNick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bvlgari/Bvlgari-Man-Wood-Essence-50602.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50602.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Bvlgari Man Wood Essence"title="Bvlgari Man Wood Essence"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1538605ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1538605" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1451442">TopPicksByNick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-04-07">04/07/22 06:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A little disappointed in the performance with this one, but this has become a staple office scent for me. A fresh woody manly scent that sticks out in the world of the stereotypical sweet shower gel fresh fragrances</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1538605"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1538605#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1533776" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1533776" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Matux"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1162868"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1162868.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Matux" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Natura/Essencial-Oud-Pimenta-67195.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67195.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Essencial Oud Pimenta"title="Essencial Oud Pimenta"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1533776ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1533776" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1162868">Matux</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-30">03/30/22 19:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Maybe a relative of Hermès H24 - it reminded me of it, but I cannot make a conclusive remark for I would have to try them hand - by - hand.<br />
<br />
It is very beautiful, complex, manly composition, not challenging nor bold, with plenty of olfative details that ask for attention - I could not help stop sniffing it every two minutes. It would be an instant decision to buy, seriously.<br />
<br />
Frankly, I am sort if baffled as to why it has not been that welcomed. I assume it is because reviewers demand sillage and longevity; yes, Hero plays quite humbly in that field. <br />
<br />
IMHo, in this case less is better.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1533776"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1533776#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1531476" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1531476" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="frederickf_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378157"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1378157.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="frederickf_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1531476ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1531476" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1378157">frederickf_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-27">03/27/22 08:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the most impressive releases of 2021 imo. Honestly do not care if this is getting any hate. I love it. It is so simplistic and modern yet unique. The level of beauty and masculinity you get from these notes is mind blowing. I’m discovering that Aurélien Guichard is a genius, and I’ll def try anything he drops.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1531476"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1531476#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1527750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1527750" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ntabassum92"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/870644"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.870644.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ntabassum92" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/M-Micallef/DesirToxic-54800.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54800.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="DesirToxic"title="DesirToxic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1527750ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1527750" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/870644">ntabassum92</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-21">03/21/22 16:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So I initially thought that Burberry Hero was nothing special, but after wearing it, I kinda like it. It's really fresh and bracing, citrusy bergamot and green, and doesn't smell typically masculine - very unisex to me. It is kind of fizzy, Skipcon is right - like a bergamot sparkling water. All the cedar notes together kind of thicken the woody base, so it doesn't smell as thin like pencil shavings as cedar sometimes can. It's good for this in-between winter and spring weather.<br />
<br />
Also, not that relevant, but I kind of like the crazy ad for this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1527750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1527750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1527354" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1527354" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="abbieclark67"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472302"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1472302.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="abbieclark67" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coco-Mademoiselle-611.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.611.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coco Mademoiselle"title="Coco Mademoiselle"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1527354ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1527354" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472302">abbieclark67</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-21">03/21/22 02:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got a sample of this and it smells freshy and kind of woody, but honestly, I expected it to project much better and its longevity to last much longer. In the beginning I could still smell it, but after an hour or so the smell disappeared... So it is a bit disappointing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1527354"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1527354#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1527346" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1527346" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Skipcon"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1238791.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Skipcon" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Eternal-Wood-93338.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93338.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eternal Wood"title="Eternal Wood"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1527346ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1527346" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1238791">Skipcon</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-21">03/21/22 02:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Modern, pleasing, fresh.<br />
<br />
This is a modern fresh, woody, office safe fragrance. Straight from the get go I get a blast of this 'woody bergamot', then it dries down quite quick into this 'fizzy woods', imagine cedar with a bergamot. Whilst like others have said, this isn't a projection beast, it's quite intimate in fact. However, it terms of longevity, it lasts around 6 hours, but you get wafts of this rather nice smell throughout the day. I smelt this in my local department store, and then I couldn't not get it, for me, it does feel along the same lines as K by Dolce and Gabanna and Dior Sauvage, however, this IS different. It's a nice 'chuck on' fragrance. Sometimes you don't want a rich heavy fragrance that isn't a citrus prominent fragrance. <br />
<br />
For me, this is a 3/5<br />
<br />
I like it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1527346"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1527346#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1522692" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1522692" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dogri"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472430"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dogri" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1522692ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1522692" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1472430">Dogri</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-13">03/13/22 18:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a great modern woody aromatic citrus fragrance, thats smells professional. It's that kind of scent that pleases everybody. The only  downside is that it is not a monster projector and performer, which is sad, because the scent doesn't need to hide.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1522692"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1522692#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1518941" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1518941" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="112237"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/907796"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="112237" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1518941ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1518941" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/907796">112237</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-08">03/08/22 07:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A well-crafted, masculine ambroxan-citrus cologne with acceptable sillage for the summer.<br />
<br />
The cedar-vetiver base reminds me with that of Narciso's Narciso Rodriguez for women (the white cube). I can smell something posh in it, like incense, oakmoss, and leather. The aromatics probably include cloves, black pepper, tobacco, oregano, and lavender. It inclines soapy in a chic way probably from shy aldehydes, musk, and a tiny touch of powdery notes. There's also some minor creamy sweetness in the background from the tonka/ vanilla.<br />
<br />
If you got bored from Bleu de Chanel EDT, then note that this falls into the same family, and Hero smells a bit more modern, but not as important, or as loud, or as permanent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1518941"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1518941#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1517296" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1517296" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mr.alpha05"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457569"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1457569.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mr.alpha05" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mandarina-Duck/Pure-Black-5679.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5679.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pure Black"title="Pure Black"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1517296ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1517296" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457569">mr.alpha05</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-05">03/05/22 16:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells like a fancy hotel soap/body wash. Very nice and expensive smelling. Doesn’t  project a whole lot but good if you want a fancy casual scent</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1517296"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1517296#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1517165" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1517165" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jruizmtz365"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314633"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jruizmtz365" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1517165ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1517165" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1314633">Jruizmtz365</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-05">03/05/22 11:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wait till it hits discounters…..overall it smells pleasing</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1517165"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1517165#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1516776" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1516776" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AlaskanAngel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1348610"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1348610.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AlaskanAngel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Kerosene/Follow-41476.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41476.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Follow"title="Follow"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1516776ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1516776" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1348610">AlaskanAngel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-04">03/04/22 20:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>An improvement over the generic "Men's" cedar frag, HERO settles into a smoother range than most. Perfectly unisex. Citrus opening quickly burns off leaving a clean cedar, woodsy scent. The dry down is warm and sweeter than the opening would suggest. Better in cooler temps. Not attention seeking or loud. Comfortable, easy, professional. Inoffensive, crowd pleasing, everyday wear. <br />
<br />
Review of official carded sample that came free with purchase.<br />
<br />
UPDATE<br />
Tested this on someone else and it was really nice! Makes you want to lean in. I enjoyed it on others more than myself. It's not for me but I appreciate it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1516776"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1516776#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1511432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1511432" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ToriaVuitton"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455420"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ToriaVuitton" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Next/Cashmere-13833.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.13833.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cashmere"title="Cashmere"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1511432ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1511432" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1455420">ToriaVuitton</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-24">02/24/22 18:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So I was sent a sample of this from Sephora, and although this sent is for men I can not help but be drawn to it. It's so clean, light, and comforting. The opening is an all time favorite of mine that I found to be common in the scents my father would wear and as the dry down comes, theres a peppery woodsy smell, and the cedar is so clean. There's a level of sophistication thats in the fragrance that I've yet to smell so cheers to this combination 💕</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1511432"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1511432#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1502455" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1502455" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BloodiestOrange"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453270"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1453270.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BloodiestOrange" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1502455ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1502455" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1453270">BloodiestOrange</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-02-11">02/11/22 11:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had the privilege of smelling and purchasing this without realizing it was from that infamous Adam Driver advert. I think that cheesy commercial turned a lot of reviewers off. Hero is not a fascinating niche fragrance, but an excellent daily driver. Cedar is the unequivocal main note here, and it stays throughout the moderate longevity with support from black pepper. The bergamot zest is more apparent at the beginning and fades throughout.<br />
<br />
I find this fragrance lovely. Minimal note-wise, everything plays a supporting role to cedar. Tailor-made for the office, it's got character without being offensive or overpowering. I tend to dislike Burberry fragrances; Mr. Burberry, in particular, smells like a day-drinking plaid-wearing football hooligan. Hero, by contrast, is outdoorsy, refined, and uninterested in the goings-on of Manchester United.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1502455"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1502455#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1492751" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1492751" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vintages"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349262"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1349262.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vintages" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Parfums-de-Marly/Layton-39314.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39314.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Layton"title="Layton"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1492751ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1492751" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1349262">vintages</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-28">01/28/22 07:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The fresh bergamot opening smells pretty nice.<br />
The DNA is spicy and peppery,  and there is a very alluring woody background. well done so far. but there is also an unmistakenly present juniper note that you should consider before blindbuying.  it depends on a person's taste but I guess, most people like it.  This is a very nice everyday manly fresh scent, not too fresh. no aquatics or sea notes, no barbershop and no shower gel - vibes, which is perfect, because I consider all of these unpleasant. and there are no intrusive notes. I think it's underrated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1492751"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1492751#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1487521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1487521" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gonzalez-alcantar01"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1150182"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1150182.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gonzalez-alcantar01" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Clive-Christian/Jump-up-and-Kiss-Me-Hedonistic-47116.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47116.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jump up and Kiss Me Hedonistic"title="Jump up and Kiss Me Hedonistic"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1487521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1487521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1150182">gonzalez-alcantar01</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-20">01/20/22 18:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The opening is refreshing after 15  minutes I'm wishing I'd saved 100 dollars and just wore my old spice after shave last time im by b colognes</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1487521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1487521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1478182" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1478182" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Kreed"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1080503"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Kreed" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1478182ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1478182" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1080503">Kreed</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-07">01/07/22 06:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The advertisement sold it for me. The bottle also looks very nice. I've bought it in a set, it was cheaper that way. I love this fragrance so much. It's definitely sexy. Performance isn't beast mode, it's moderate, but I love it that way. Not every fragrance needs to be aggressive and massively projecting. Sometimes you do not want to fill up the whole room.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1478182"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1478182#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1477791" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I'd still f*ck Centaur Adam Driver if he was wearing this scent. It's just not my fave.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1472637"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1472637#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1472058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1472058" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Guccipordior"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298002"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1298002.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Guccipordior" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-25780.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25780.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L’Homme Ideal"title="L’Homme Ideal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1472058ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1472058" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298002">Guccipordior</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-12-28">12/28/21 18:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Unfairly panned, it's a simple fragrance- yes. But when it comes down to it, it smells like the notes listed and isn't trying to be more. No ambroxan bomb here. It's clean, fresh cut cedar, with a sharp bergamot and pepper opening, along with juniper for aromatic touches. It's very woody, very clean, very fresh. Not soapy or powdery. It is a great fragrance if you look at it objectively. Anyone who smells this will think that it smells good. It would not repel anyone. <br />
<br />
I think this is great. It smells high quality and the cedar smells crisp and fresh. It's a very clean, safe scent. Longevity isn't the best, so bring a decant. The opening is really bright and clean. Very nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1472058"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1472058#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="68627" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1390061" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1390061" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Guccipordior"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298002"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1298002.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Guccipordior" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-25780.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.25780.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="L’Homme Ideal"title="L’Homme Ideal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1390061ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck7x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1390061" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1298002">Guccipordior</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-10">08/10/21 14:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a good fragrance. Everyone sets the bar so high for new releases. Not everything is going to be the next Aventus- it also smells NOTHNG like Aventus, so if anyone says that, they're being an idiot. Burberry has always released consistently good fragrances. Nothing "bad". They aren't super ground breaking but produce nice, unique scents that are not like typical designer releases of the time. Even their "blue" fragrance did not have ambroxan- Mr. Burberry. It was perfumed by Kurdkjian who has done a ton of Burberry stuff. That was a vetiver based blue frag that everyone slept on.<br />
<br />
And again this will be slept on. People will continue to pass Burberry to the side because they always see it at rack stores. The bottle is too simple. Blah blah blah.<br />
<br />
This smells like the notes. Bergamot, pepper, and juniper make a spicy opening on a very, very clean and woody base. I'm sure there's more to it, but most of us don't know how these aromachemicals mix so it's easier to just name simple accords. <br />
<br />
It's a spicy, fresh, woody fragrance. It doesn't smell like Sauvage or BDC, no ambroxan at all. Not even a tinge. It does not smell synthetic at all. Its woody cedar at the base. This is a good fragrance that I can't wait to get a full bottle of. I have tried a sample. I suspect some normal atomizer sprays will get decent longevity on this. The cedar should last forever.<br />
<br />
Don't listen to people that hate this already, it's barely been out. It's not groundbreaking. It's a nice fragrance, it's clean and woody. It doesn't smell like everything else. It isn't sweet like candy or anything. It's sweet like a woody sweet. Woody is definitely the word for this. I cannot compare this to any other fragrances I have smelled lately.<br />
<br />
It may be somewhat generic but it doesn't smell like anything else. I can't wait to buy a bottle of this.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1390061"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1390061#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1872437" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1872437" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BallSniffer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1558402"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1558402.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BallSniffer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Scandal-Pour-Homme-68074.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68074.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scandal Pour Homme"title="Scandal Pour Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1872437ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck5x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1872437" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1558402">BallSniffer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-07-06">07/06/23 06:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find it amusing when a designer fragrance is called generic and isn't remotely similar to anything else.<br />
<br />
Hero by Burberry is like stepping into a fresh cedar forest on a brisk morning.<br />
<br />
I can't help but compare it to Dior Homme 2020; while Dior takes you on a crisp, clean journey with its breezy and effervescent vibes, Burberry's Hero is like the rugged and adventurous sibling.<br />
<br />
Versatile and masculine</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1872437"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1872437#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2088480" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I love it and it's my beautiful underrated boy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="2088480"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=2088480#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1892073" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/858106">bmcd921</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-01">08/01/23 17:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I don’t know what it is about this fragrance, but I REALLY enjoy it, and there’s room for it in my collection. I love the simplicity of the bottle design, the versatility and wearability of the fragrance itself - it just really does it for me. The reviews saying it’s nothing mind blowing are correct, but it’s also not another ambroxan or tonka bomb.  Clean, sophisticated, and safe. Definitely blind buy worthy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1892073"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1892073#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2027019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
