</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1431508" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1431508" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Paul Apo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237990"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Paul Apo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Alhambra/Jean-Lowe-Immortal-83666.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.83666.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jean Lowe Immortal"title="Jean Lowe Immortal"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1431508ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1431508" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1237990">Paul Apo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-20">10/20/21 13:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The perfume smells good.  when I smelled it for the first time I was not very captivated.  I was in a perfume store and I applied the perfume to my hand.  The magic began in the drying for moments, a pleasant and rich aroma was felt and my friends asked me what that perfume is called, well when I returned it to smell the truth that it was a manly and very pleasant smell.  After that I went back to the store and bought myself a 100 ml bottle.  Every day I enjoy it.  I wear it to work.  My co-workers like it.  My opinion is that they try it, they will not be disappointed.  It is more for fall and spring climates.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1431508"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1431508#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1853524" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1853524" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="flem"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/14736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.14736.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="flem" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Theodoros-Kalotinis/Alluring-Fig-68196.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68196.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Alluring Fig"title="Alluring Fig"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1853524ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1853524" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/14736">flem</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-10">06/10/23 14:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Peppery, kind of sweet. Woodsy. You can definitely pick out the cedar in the opening. I would have expected maybe some vanilla or something sweeter in the note breakdown. But overall, it’s kind of a generic, wintery pepper scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1853524"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1853524#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1397865" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1397865" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LaContessina"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308645"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1308645.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LaContessina" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Barenia-96428.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.96428.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Barénia"title="Barénia"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1397865ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1397865" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308645">LaContessina</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-08-24">08/24/21 05:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Beautiful bottle, elegant and classy.That's all.<br />
The fragrance itself is plain boring, one of the countless 'blue' colognes that are pervading the market nowadays.<br />
Yes, it's fresh, woody, very generic and you could say its Sauvage or Bleu de Chanel or the like... they're all similar and boring. <br />
The masculine equivalent of the 'fruitchouli' trend in the feminine range dare I say.<br />
Why everybody would like to smell the same I don't get.<br />
And for smelling like everybody they ask you the steepy price of Eur 98 for a 100ml bottle (rack price seen today at Sephora when testing).<br />
Thank you, next.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1397865"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1397865#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1455152" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1455152" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nikolay_marinchev"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24499"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.24499.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nikolay_marinchev" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Cologne-1004.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1004.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Cologne"title="Allure Homme Sport Cologne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1455152ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1455152" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/24499">nikolay_marinchev</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-30">11/30/21 15:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Nothing new and special. Just the next ordinary fragrance with no face. Poor longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1455152"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1455152#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1786544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1786544" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tony Balkan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029609"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1029609.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tony Balkan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rochas/Moustache-Original-1949-52351.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.52351.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Moustache Original 1949"title="Moustache Original 1949"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1786544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1786544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1029609">Tony Balkan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-18">03/18/23 07:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Cheap simplistic smelling fresh woody fragrance, related but not similar to Dior Homme 2020, just as the "reminds me of" section suggests. So, you have now two of these to pick from.😁</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68627"comment_id="1786544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Burberry/Hero-68627.html?ccid=1786544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="68627" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Juliette-Has-A-Gun.html" class="en2inter">Juliette Has A Gun</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 1.7em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">60.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Roja-Dove.html" class="en2inter">Roja Dove</a>
        </span>
    </div>
            </div>
        </div>

    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
